    public class ClusterClientOptions

    • 方法详细资料

      • copyOf

        public static ClusterClientOptions copyOf(ClusterClientOptions options)
        Create a copy of options.
        参数:
        options - the original
        返回:
        A new instance of ClusterClientOptions containing the values of options

      • builder

        public static ClusterClientOptions.Builder builder()
        Returns a new ClusterClientOptions.Builder to construct ClusterClientOptions.
        返回:
        a new ClusterClientOptions.Builder to construct ClusterClientOptions.

      • create

        public static ClusterClientOptions create()
        Create a new ClusterClientOptions using default settings.
        返回:
        a new instance of default cluster client client options.

      • isRefreshClusterView

        public boolean isRefreshClusterView()
        Flag, whether regular cluster topology updates are updated. The client starts updating the cluster topology in the intervals of getRefreshPeriod(). Defaults to false. Returns the value from ClusterTopologyRefreshOptions if provided.
        返回:
        true it the cluster topology view is updated periodically

      • getRefreshPeriod

        public Duration getRefreshPeriod()
        Period between the regular cluster topology updates. Defaults to 60. Returns the value from ClusterTopologyRefreshOptions if provided.
        返回:
        the period between the regular cluster topology updates

      • isCloseStaleConnections

        public boolean isCloseStaleConnections()
        Flag, whether to close stale connections when refreshing the cluster topology. Defaults to true. Comes only into effect if isRefreshClusterView() is true. Returns the value from ClusterTopologyRefreshOptions if provided.
        返回:
        true if stale connections are cleaned up after cluster topology updates

      • isValidateClusterNodeMembership

        public boolean isValidateClusterNodeMembership()
        Validate the cluster node membership before allowing connections to a cluster node. Defaults to true.
        返回:
        true if validation is enabled.

      • getMaxRedirects

        public int getMaxRedirects()
        Number of maximal of cluster redirects (-MOVED and -ASK) to follow in case a key was moved from one node to another node. Defaults to 5. See DEFAULT_MAX_REDIRECTS.
        返回:
        the maximal number of followed cluster redirects

      • getTopologyRefreshOptions

        public ClusterTopologyRefreshOptions getTopologyRefreshOptions()
        The ClusterTopologyRefreshOptions for detailed control of topology updates.
        返回:
        the ClusterTopologyRefreshOptions.
